Architecture.description: The architecture of the virtual machine. Valid values: i386 | x86_64

ClientToken.description: The token to enable idempotency for VM import requests.

Description.description: A description string for the import image task.

DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

Hypervisor.description: The target hypervisor platform. Valid values: xen

LicenseType.description: The license type to be used for the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) after importing.  Note: You may only use BYOL if you have existing licenses with rights to use these licenses in a third party cloud like AWS. For more information, see Prerequisites in the VM Import/Export User Guide. Valid values: AWS | BYOL

Platform.description: The operating system of the virtual machine. Valid values: Windows | Linux

RoleName.description: The name of the role to use when not using the default role, 'vmimport'.
